verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4467>reign<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to me; <S%H6213>Make<s%> you <S%H4147>bonds<s%> and <S%H4133>yokes,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on your <S%H6677>neck,<s%>

And <S%H7971>send<s%> them to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5984>Ammonites,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> which <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>

And <S%H6680>command<s%> them to <S%H559>say<s%> to their <S%H113>masters,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to your <S%H113>masters;<s%>

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> and the <S%H929>beast<s%> that are on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> by my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by my <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to <S%H834>whom<s%> it <S%H5869>seemed<s%> <S%H3474>meet<s%> to me.

And <S%H6258>now<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H776>lands<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H1571>also<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, and his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the very <S%H6256>time<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>come:<s%> and then <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> themselves of him.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that the <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the same <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and that will not <S%H5414>put<s%> their <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> that <S%H1471>nation<s%> will I <S%H6485>punish,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and with the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I have <S%H8552>consumed<s%> them by his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Therefore <S%H8085>listen<s%> not you to your <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> nor to your <S%H7080>diviners,<s%> nor to your <S%H2492>dreamers,<s%> nor to your <S%H6049>enchanters,<s%> nor to your <S%H3786>sorcerers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> You shall not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon:<s%>

For they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> to you, to <S%H7368>remove<s%> you <S%H7368>far<s%> from your <S%H127>land;<s%> and that I should <S%H5080>drive<s%> you out, and you should <S%H6>perish.<s%>

But the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, those will I let <S%H5117>remain<s%> still in their own <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they shall <S%H5647>till<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> also to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935>Bring<s%> your <S%H6677>necks<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2421>live.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> will you <S%H4191>die,<s%> you and your <S%H5971>people,<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> that will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon?<s%>

Therefore <S%H8085>listen<s%> not to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H559>speak<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> You shall not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> for they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> to you.

For I have not <S%H7971>sent<s%> them, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> yet they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> in my <S%H8034>name;<s%> that I might <S%H5080>drive<s%> you out, and that you might <S%H6>perish,<s%> you, and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to you.

Also I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8085>Listen<s%> not to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H4120>shortly<s%> be <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> for they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> to you.

<S%H8085>Listen<s%> not to them; <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H2421>live:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> should <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> be laid <S%H2723>waste?<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> they be <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be with them, let them <S%H4994>now<s%> make <S%H6293>intercession<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> which are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> not to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H4369>bases,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that <S%H3498>remain<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H834>Which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> not, when he <S%H1546>carried<s%> away <S%H1540>captive<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

<S%H3588>Yes,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that <S%H3498>remain<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

They shall be <S%H935>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shall they be <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6485>visit<s%> them, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> then will I <S%H5927>bring<s%> them up, and <S%H7725>restore<s%> them to <S%H2008>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>
